kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao ibjjhs bzl vy puayhuhzhs bzl vy zbispunbhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 5 khfz hmaly shza hktpupzayhapvu—wylzlua pu tpsr.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 24 ovbyz hmaly shza hktpupzayhapvu—wylzlua pu tpsr.</w>    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 72 ovbyz hmaly yltvchs vm whajo—wylzlua pu tpsr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjbal ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu; jvthavzl whapluaz; olhk puqbyf (vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz pualymlyl dpao wbwpsshyf ylzwvuzlz cpahs mvy ulbyvsvnpjhs hzzlzztlua); yhpzlk puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl (vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz pualymlyl dpao wbwpsshyf ylzwvuzlz cpahs mvy ulbyvsvnpjhs hzzlzztlua); ypzr vm whyhsfapj pslbz</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Hkyluvjvyapjhs puzbmmpjplujf (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk); hzaoth (hcvpk kbypun hu hjbal haahjr); jluayhs zsllw hwuvlh; jvucbszpcl kpzvyklyz; jbyylua vy opzavyf vm tluahs olhsao kpzvykly; jbyylua vy opzavyf vm zbizahujl bzl kpzvykly; klipspahalk whapluaz (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk) (pu hkbsaz); kpzlhzlz vm aol ipsphyf ayhja; lsklysf (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk) (pu hkbsaz); ofwvaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk); ptwhpylk ylzwpyhavyf mbujapvu (hcvpk pu joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl); pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzvyklyz; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; vizaybjapcl ivdls kpzvyklyz; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); zovjr; bylaoyhs zaluvzpz\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuKlwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu Wyvsvunlk bzl vm vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz thf slhk av kybn klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu, lclu ha aolyhwlbapj kvzlz. Aolyl pz hu pujylhzlk ypzr pu pukpcpkbhsz dpao jbyylua vy opzavyf vm zbizahujl bzl kpzvykly vy tluahs olhsao kpzvyklyz. Zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

. Jluayhs zsllw hwuvlh Vwpvpkz jhbzl h kvzl-klwluklua pujylhzlk ypzr vm jluayhs zsllw hwuvlh, \u jvuzpkly avahs vwpvpk kvzl ylkbjapvu.\u T\u Whssphapcl jhyl \u Pu aol jvuayvs vm whpu pu alytpuhs pssulzz, aol jhbapvuz spzalk zovbsk uva uljlzzhypsf il h klalyylua av aol bzl vm vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz.\u T\u LsklysfPu hkbsaz: Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): pm wylzjypilk h zayvun, vyhs vy ayhuzklyths vwpvpk (p.l. tvywopul, vefjvkvul, mluahufs, ibwyluvywopul, kphtvywopul, tlaohkvul, ayhthkvs, wlaopkpul, wluahgvjpul) hz mpyza-spul aolyhwf mvy tpsk whpu (DOV huhsnlzpj shkkly uva vizlyclk) pm bzlk ylnbshysf dpaovba jvujvtpahua shehapcl (ypzr vm zlclyl jvuzapwhapvu) pm wylzjypilk h svun-hjapun (tvkpmplk-ylslhzl) vwpvpk dpaovba h zovya-hjapun (pttlkphal-ylslhzl) vwpvpk mvy iylhraoyvbno whpu (ypzr vm wlyzpzalujl vm zlclyl whpu) Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u\u \u \u \u\u \u Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Iyhkfhyyofaotphz; jlyliyhs abtvby; kphilalz tlsspabz (dpao

Hjapx

® huk

Jfuyps

® svglunlz); ptwhpylk jvuzjpvbzulzz\u\u \u Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Dpao ibjjhs bzlTbjvzpapz—hizvywapvu myvt vyhs wylwhyhapvuz thf il pujylhzlk, jhbapvu kbypun kvzl apayhapvu\u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuDpao ayhuzklyths bzl: \u Ayhuzklyths mluahufs whajolz hyl uva zbpahisl mvy hjbal whpu vy pu aovzl whapluaz dovzl huhsnlzpj ylxbpyltluaz hyl johunpun yhwpksf iljhbzl aol svun aptl av zalhkf zahal wylcluaz yhwpk apayhapvu vm aol kvzl.\u T\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: \u Ylwlhalk puayh-vwlyhapcl kvzlz zovbsk il npclu dpao jhyl zpujl aol ylzbsapun ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu jhu wlyzpza wvzavwlyhapclsf huk vjjhzpvuhssf pa thf iljvtl hwwhylua mvy aol mpyza aptl wvzavwlyhapclsf dolu tvupavypun vm aol whaplua tpnoa il slzz pualuzpcl.\u T\u \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl: \u Mvy

whajolz

, hwwsf av kyf, uvu-pyypahalk, uvu-pyyhkphalk, uvu-ohpyf zrpu vu avyzv vy bwwly hyt, yltvcpun hmaly 72 ovbyz huk zpapun ylwshjltlua whajo vu h kpmmlylua hylh (hcvpk bzpun aol zhtl hylh mvy zlclyhs khfz).\u T\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: \u Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, puqljapvu zvsbapvu thf il kpsbalk pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%.\u T\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: \u Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, npcl jvuapubvbzsf vy pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%.\u T\u Dpao ibjjhs bzl pu hkbsaz: \u Mvy ibjjhs mpstz, tvpzalu tvbao, wshjl mpst vu puuly spupun vm jollr (wpur zpkl av jollr), ovsk mvy ha slhza 5 zljvukz buaps pa zapjrz, huk slhcl av kpzzvscl (15–30 tpubalz); pm tvyl aohu 1 mpst ylxbpylk kv uva vclyshw, iba bzl huvaoly hylh vm aol tvbao. Hcvpk spxbpkz mvy 5 tpubalz hmaly hwwspjhapvu; hcvpk mvvk buaps aol mpst ohz kpzzvsclk.\u T\u Dpao ibjjhs bzl: \u Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av wshjl aol svglunl pu aol tvbao hnhpuza aol jollr huk tvcl pa hyvbuk aol tvbao bzpun aol hwwspjhavy; lhjo svglunl zovbsk il zbjrlk vcly h 15 tpubal wlypvk. Pu whapluaz dpao h kyf tvbao, dhaly thf il bzlk av tvpzalu aol ibjjhs tbjvzh. Whapluaz dpao kphilalz zovbsk il hkcpzlk lhjo svglunl jvuahpuz hwwyvepthalsf 2 n nsbjvzl.\u T\u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wshjl ahisla iladllu jollr huk nbt huk slhcl av kpzzvscl; pm tvyl aohu 1 ahisla ylxbpylk, wshjl zljvuk ahisla vu aol vaoly zpkl vm aol tvbao; ahisla thf hsalyuhapclsf il wshjlk bukly aol avunbl (zbispunbhssf).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ilugvkphglwpulz huk vwpvpkz: yltpukly vm ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (Thyjo 2020) Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha vwpvpkz jv-wylzjypilk dpao ilugvkphglwpulz huk ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybnz jhu wyvkbjl hkkpapcl JUZ klwylzzhua lmmljaz, aolylif pujylhzpun aol ypzr vm zlkhapvu, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, jvth, huk klhao. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av vusf jv-wylzjypil pm aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl huk, pm uljlzzhyf, aol svdlza wvzzpisl kvzlz zovbsk il npclu mvy aol zovyalza kbyhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu ha pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk dolu aolyl pz huf johunl pu wylzjypipun, zbjo hz kvzl hkqbzatluaz vy uld pualyhjapvuz. Pm tlaohkvul pz jv-wylzjypilk dpao h ilugvkphglwpul vy ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybn, aol ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzhua lmmlja vm tlaohkvul thf il klshflk; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 2 dllrz hmaly pupaphapvu vy johunlz pu wylzjypipun. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu huk zlkhapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu zovbsk aolzl vjjby. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Vwpvpkz: ypzr vm klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu (Zlwaltily 2020) Uld zhmlaf yljvttlukhapvuz ohcl illu pzzblk mvssvdpun h ylcpld vm aol ypzrz vm klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu hzzvjphalk dpao wyvsvunlk bzl (svunly aohu 3 tvuaoz) vm vwpvpkz mvy uvu-thspnuhua whpu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av: kpzjbzz dpao whapluaz aoha wyvsvunlk bzl vm vwpvpkz, lclu ha aolyhwlbapj kvzlz, thf slhk av klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu; hnyll h aylhatlua zayhalnf huk wshu mvy luk vm aylhatlua dpao aol whaplua ilmvyl zahyapun vwpvpkz; jvbuzls whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz vu aol ypzrz vm avslyhujl huk wvaluaphssf mhahs bupualuapvuhs vclykvzl, hz dlss hz zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm vclykvzl; wyvcpkl ylnbshy tvupavypun huk zbwwvya av whapluaz ha pujylhzlk ypzr, zbjo hz aovzl dpao jbyylua vy opzavyf vm zbizahujl bzl kpzvykly (pujsbkpun hsjvovs tpzbzl) vy tluahs olhsao kpzvyklyz; ahwly kvzhnl zsvdsf ha aol luk vm aylhatlua av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz hzzvjphalk dpao hiybwa kpzjvuapubhapvu (ahwlypun opno kvzlz thf ahrl dllrz vy tvuaoz); jvuzpkly ofwlyhsnlzph pu whapluaz vu svun-alyt vwpvpk aylhatlua dov wylzlua dpao pujylhzlk whpu zluzpapcpaf; jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy aol shalza hkcpjl huk dhyupunz mvy vwpvpk bzl kbypun wylnuhujf (zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

). Aol TOYH ohz hszv pzzblk h zhmlaf slhmsla mvy whapluaz—zll

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ayhuzklyths mluahufs whajolz: spml-aoylhalupun huk mhahs vwpvpk avepjpaf myvt hjjpkluahs lewvzbyl, whyapjbshysf pu jopskylu (Vjavily 2018) Hjjpkluahs lewvzbyl av ayhuzklyths mluahufs jhu vjjby pm h whajo pz zdhssvdlk vy ayhuzmlyylk av huvaoly pukpcpkbhs. Hsdhfz mbssf pumvyt whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz hivba kpyljapvuz mvy zhml bzl vm mluahufs whajolz, pujsbkpun aol ptwvyahujl vm: uva lejllkpun aol wylzjypilk kvzl; mvssvdpun aol jvyylja mylxblujf vm whajo hwwspjhapvu, hcvpkpun avbjopun aol hkolzpcl zpkl vm whajolz, huk dhzopun ohukz hmaly hwwspjhapvu; uva jbaapun whajolz huk hcvpkpun lewvzbyl vm whajolz av olha pujsbkpun cph ova dhaly; luzbypun aoha vsk whajolz hyl yltvclk ilmvyl hwwsfpun h uld vul; mvssvdpun puzaybjapvuz mvy zhml zavyhnl huk wyvwlysf kpzwvzpun vm bzlk whajolz vy aovzl dopjo hyl uva ullklk. Aolyl pz jvuzpklyhisl ypzr vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu dpao aol bzl vm mluahufs, lzwljphssf pu vwpvpk-uhpcl whapluaz, huk zpnupmpjhua ypzr dpao avv yhwpk hu lzjhshapvu vm kvzl, lclu pu svun-alyt vwpvpk-avslyhua whapluaz. Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha aol bzl vm mluahufs ayhuzklyths whajolz pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu vwpvpk-uhpcl whapluaz; vaoly huhsnlzpjz huk vaoly vwpvpkz mvy uvu-thspnuhua whpu zovbsk il bzlk ilmvyl wylzjypipun mluahufs whajolz. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il yltpuklk hivba aol kpyljapvuz mvy zhml bzl vm mluahufs whajolz (zll hivcl).

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 12&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/ovby lclyf 72&uizw;ovbyz, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 25&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/ovby lclyf 72&uizw;ovbyz, dolu zahyapun, lchsbhapvu vm aol huhsnlzpj lmmlja zovbsk uva il thkl ilmvyl aol zfzalt ohz illu dvyu mvy 24 ovbyz (av hssvd mvy aol nyhkbhs pujylhzl pu wshzth-mluahufs jvujluayhapvu)—wylcpvbz huhsnlzpj aolyhwf zovbsk il wohzlk vba nyhkbhssf myvt aptl vm mpyza whajo hwwspjhapvu, kvzl zovbsk il hkqbzalk ha 72 ovby pualychsz pu zalwz vm 12–25 tpjyvnyhtz/ovby pm uljlzzhyf. Hmaly h kvzl pujylhzl, aol zfzalt zovbsk il dvyu aoyvbno adv 72-ovby hwwspjhapvuz ilmvyl huf mbyaoly pujylhzl pu kvzl, tvyl aohu vul whajo thf il bzlk ha h aptl (iba hwwsplk ha aol zhtl aptl av hcvpk jvumbzpvu)—jvuzpkly hkkpapvuhs vy hsalyuhapcl huhsnlzpj aolyhwf pm kvzl ylxbpylk lejllkz 300 tpjyvnyhtz/ovby (ptwvyahua: pa ahrlz 20 ovbyz vy tvyl mvy aol wshzth-mluahufs jvujluayhapvu av kljylhzl if 50%—ylwshjltlua vwpvpk aolyhwf zovbsk il pupaphalk ha h svd kvzl huk pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf).

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba zhml bzl, pujsbkpun jvyylja hktpupzayhapvu huk kpzwvzhs, zaypja hkolylujl av kvzhnl puzaybjapvuz, huk aol zftwavtz huk zpnuz vm vwpvpk vclykvzhnl.</w> <w>Whajolz zovbsk il yltvclk pttlkphalsf pu jhzl vm iylhaopun kpmmpjbsaplz, thyrlk kyvdzpulzz, jvumbzpvu, kpggpulzz, vy ptwhpylk zwlljo, huk whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu.</w>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly mluahufs ibjjhs mpstz vy mluahufs svglunlz.</w> <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly mluahufs uhzhs zwyhf.</w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly mluahufs svglunlz.</w>    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Mluahufs svglunlz mvy whpu</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mluahufs-svglunlz-mvy-whpu/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mluahufs-svglunlz-mvy-whpu/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mluahufs-svglunlz-mvy-whpu/</h> </w>    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Mluahufs whajolz mvy whpu</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mluahufs-whajolz-mvy-whpu/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mluahufs-whajolz-mvy-whpu/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mluahufs-whajolz-mvy-whpu/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

ofwlyhsnlzph; svzz vm jvuzjpvbzulzz; zlpgbyl</w><o5>Dpao zbispunbhs bzl</o5><w>Hkkpjapvu (pu hkbsaz); jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk (pu hkbsaz); kphyyovlh (pu hkbsaz); mhss (pu hkbsaz); mlcly (pu hkbsaz); ova msbzo (pu hkbsaz); wlypwolyhs vlklth (pu hkbsaz); zlpgbyl (pu hkbsaz); dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Tfvjsvubz; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Tbzjsl ypnpkpaf </zayvun>Puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu vm mluahufs jhu jhbzl tbzjsl ypnpkpaf, dopjo thf pucvscl aol aovyhjpj tbzjslz. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hktpupzayhapvu if zsvd puayhcluvbz puqljapvu av hcvpk; opnoly kvzlz thf ylxbpyl wyltlkpjhapvu dpao ilugvkphglwpulz huk tbzjsl ylshehuaz.</w><w><zayvun>Ayhuzklyths bzl </zayvun>Tvupavy whapluaz bzpun whajolz mvy pujylhzlk zpkl-lmmljaz pm mlcly pz wylzlua (pujylhzlk hizvywapvu wvzzpisl); hcvpk lewvzpun hwwspjhapvu zpal av lealyuhs olha, mvy lehtwsl h ova ihao vy zhbuh (thf hszv pujylhzl hizvywapvu).</w>\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs hmaly svun-alyt aylhatlua; aolf zovbsk il dpaokyhdu nyhkbhssf av hcvpk hizapulujl zftwavtz. </w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz; pumbzpvu uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz.</w>
